text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Bankrupting America wont cure covid19.  The whole point of closing down was so hospitals wouldn't be overwhelmed. We have done that so now open up everything except maybe a few really hot spots and nursing homes.  I dont think poverty, starvation, and homelessness is the answer.
